metadata.Title: CVE-2020-27511 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in the stripTags and unescapeHTML components inPrototype 1.7.3 where an attacker can cause a Regular Expression Denial ofService (ReDOS) through stripping crafted HTML tags.

criterions.comment: prototypejs: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
